attributes.action: All cats must wear pyjamas in bed and be addressed as 'Beefy Logs' on Sundays.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cats like pyjamas they keep them warm. 'Beefy Logs' is a fine name for a cat and we should celebrate it!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
